overview: AJâ€™s 18 years of technology marketing experience include 12 years as president of San Francisco-based agency Bravo! Marketing. There he pioneered new types of online and multi-channel communication programs for B2B technology clients that included Cisco Systems, Fidelity Ventures, IDC, and PeopleSoft. He and his team were instrumental in growing several startups into public companies, including ValueClick and Verio Web Hosting. AJ understood the value of large networks very early. After attending the University of California at Berkeley, he went to SGI where he led the rollout of a graphical online service five years before the existence of the worldwide web.
